version_description:
* New interface!
* Timer option
* Grid option
* Lots of other small fixes and improvements
Improved alignment reliability, especially on 6s devices

* Introducing a new feature! Enhance shadows brightens dark areas of your photo without making it look unnatural or processed.

* Improved image quality for OpenGL ES 3 devices (iPhone 5s and later).

* Lots of small improvements and fixes.

- All new manual exposure controls including shutter priority, ISO priority and full manual modes
- Improved image quality on all devices
- Many other small improvements

version_name: 2.12:* Option to switch between raw and video input (video input was used prior to version 2.1)* Several raw improvements: fixed purple artifacts in very low light

version_description:
Version 2.12:
* Option to switch between raw and video input (video input was used prior to version 2.1)
* Several raw improvements: fixed purple artifacts in very low light, auto detect contrast, fixed enhance shadows brightening too much near edges

Version 2.11:
* Fixed crash on iPhone 5s, 6 and 6 plus

Version 2.1:
* Cortex Cam now uses raw data as input! Using raw data allows for even better image detail and improved zooming. Raw data is only available on devices with 13 MP cameras. Note that Cortex Cam processes the raw data to produce a JPG or TIFF image and does not currently output raw images.
* Support for TIFF format
* Option to use telephoto lens on iPhone 7 plus
* Fixed front camera on iPhone 7, fixed countdown timer, improved focus reliability, and many other bug fixes

Support for iPhone X, XS, and XR:
- Optimized for large screens
- Fixed telephoto lens on XS
- Adjusted exposure for new sensor

General Improvements:
- Improved noise reduction when a large gain is applied during image processing
- Fixed several exposure control and layout issues
- Reduced stuttering sound during exposure
- Exposure settings are now saved when the app is closed
- Restored full resolution photos in image browser

- Improved image quality and color balance in very low light conditions
- Fixed an issue that could prevent the exposure progress bar from displaying
- Fixed an advanced exposure control issue that caused light metering updates to stop
- Prevented screen from sleeping during very long exposures

*** Version 2.15 ***

Support for iPhone X, XS, and XR:
- Optimized for large screens
- Fixed telephoto lens on XS
- Adjusted exposure for new sensor
General Improvements:
- Improved noise reduction when a large gain is applied during image processing
- Fixed several exposure control and layout issues
- Reduced stuttering sound during exposure
- Exposure settings are now saved when the app is closed
- Restored full resolution photos in image browser

- Further improved color balance, especially when combining more than 50 frames
- Remove motion blur is now off by default
- Restored RAW / Video input switch on certain iPad models

*** Version 2.16 ***

- Improved image quality and color balance in very low light conditions
- Fixed an issue that could prevent the exposure progress bar from displaying
- Fixed an advanced exposure control issue that caused light metering updates to stop
- Prevented screen from sleeping during very long exposures
